Class PropertiesFDMJobConfiguration

All Implemented Interfaces:
FDMJob.Configuration, PropertyLoader
public class PropertiesFDMJobConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements FDMJob.Configuration, PropertyLoader

Implementation of FDMJob.Configuration that can read a configuration from Properties object

Author:
Luigi Sgro
